page.title: 08DANCING AND MAJORETTES
page.content: I GO TO DANCING CLASSES ON MONDAY NIGHTS AT 6 O'CLOCK.I GO WITH 4 OTHER CHILDREN ON MONDAY.I AM TAKING MY EXAM IN OCTOBER.FIRST OF ALL I HELP THE LITTLE ONES.IT IS HELD IN THE METHODIST CHAPEL BETWEEN 6.00 TO 7.00.WE ARE DOING A SHOW THIS MONTH ON 3 NIGHTS.I AM A CAT AND A DRIVER AND I AM IN THE IRISH JIG.MY TEACHER IS MISS COLLISON WHEN I HAVE TAKEN MY EXAM I WILL BE IN MISS TOTTLE'S CLASS. {MAJORETTES-}AT MAJORETTES WE ARE PRACTICING OUR ROUTINES FOR EVENTS E.G WINGS AND WHEELS AND COLLET DAY WE ARE DOING A COMPETION AT THE END OF JUNE.WE WORK FROM 6.00 TILL 7.30. MY TEACHER IS CALLED MRS COLLISON.I GO TO THE METHODIST CHAPEL ON TUESDAY EVERY WEEK.WE RAISE MONEY BY DOING THINGS LIKE SPONSORED WALKS AND JUMBLE SALES.ONCE WHEN WE DID OUR ROUTINE IN THE TOWN WE RAISED Â£4.50!
